mapper.select: SELECT pd.id, pd.NAME, pd.name_in, pd.curr_fund, pd.name_en, pd.name_ru, pd.cover_images, pd.category, pd.type, pd.has_group_buy_option, pd.lucky_number_range_start, pd.lucky_number_range_end, pd.reward_product, pd.daily_interest, pd.cycle, pd.minimum_buy, pd.maximum_buy, pd.fund_type, pd.progress, pd.show_progress_bar, pd.selling_timestamp, pd.description, pd.description_en, pd.total_fund, pd.copies, pd.is_visible, pd.is_draws, pd.is_voucher, pd.voucher_start, pd.voucher_end, pd.on_sale, IFNULL(pp.cun, 0) buyCount FROM pan_product pd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count( pan.product ) cun, pan.product FROM pan_purchase pan WHERE pan.buyer = #{userId} GROUP BY pan.product ) pp ON pd.id = pp.product where pd.name!='Treasure' and pd.is_visible = '0' ORDER BY pd.category
